name: Lodestone
effect:
The Anchor becomes SLOWED and creates a Burst 3 area of gravitomagnetic interference. While active, hostile characters in the area are SLOWED and cannot teleport into or out of the area. In addition, allied characters within the area are not valid targets for ranged attacks. Other characters with LODESTONE are unaffected by this system.

These effects last the end of the Anchor’s next turn, until it uses this system again, or until it’s STUNNED, overheated, or destroyed.

name: Gravity Cannon
effect: On Attack: Choose to either Attract or Repulse.
on_hit: The target is pulled 3 spaces directly towards the Anchor (Attract) or pushed 3 spaces directly away from the Anchor (Repulse) until they hit an obstruction. If the target collides with an obstruction, they must pass a HULL save or be knocked PRONE.

name: Siege Armor
effect: The Anchor has RESISTANCE to all damage from attacks that originate beyond Range 3.

name: Reality Anchor
effect: All characters affected by LODESTONE gain IMMUNITY to INTANGIBLE. In addition, they may target and affect INTANGIBLE characters and objects, and they may be targeted and affected by INTANGIBLE characters.

name: Omninet Grounding
effect: Allied characters affected by LODESTONE are not valid targets for tech actions.

name: Newtonian Amplifier
effect: The Anchor creates a Line 8 path of gravitic energy. All characters within the path or above it must pass a HULL save or first be IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn and then knocked PRONE.

name: Magnetic Reversal
trigger: An allied character in the Anchor’s SENSORS takes damage from a ranged attack.
effect: The allied character gains RESISTANCE to all damage from the attack, and the attacker must pass a HULL save or be pushed 3 spaces away from their target and knocked PRONE.

name: Null-Grav Motivator
effect: The Anchor creates three Blast 1 areas in SENSORS extending 6 spaces high. These areas become zero-g areas that last until the Anchor uses this system again. Characters within the areas upon their creation must pass an AGILITY save or be IMPAIRED until the end of their next turn.

name: Marathon Arquebus
effect: Allied characters in the affected area are not attacked, but instead gain OVERSHIELD {3/5/7}.

name: Arc Feedback
effect: An allied character within SENSORS gains OVERSHIELD {4/6/8}. A hostile character that causes the target to lose this OVERSHIELD must pass an ENGINEERING save or become SHREDDED until the end of their next turn and take {2/4/6} Energy damage.

name: Reciprocity
effect: Whenever the Capacitor grants OVERSHIELD to another character, it gains the same amount of OVERSHIELD.

name: Quickening Bolt
effect: Choose one character within SENSORS. The target gains OVERSHIELD {4/6/8}. Until the target loses all OVERSHIELD, they may BOOST as a free action.

name: Purifying Lightning
effect: Allies affected by the MARATHON ARQUEBUS may clear up to one condition.

name: Deflecting Shot
trigger: An allied character that can be targeted by the MARATHON ARQUEBUS is hit by an attack.
effect: The Capacitor first SKIRMISHES with the MARATHON ARQUEBUS, dealing half damage, heat, or burn to all targets. The triggering allied character must be included in the attack’s area.

name: Cyclic Discharge
effect: The Capacitor loses all OVERSHIELD and cannot gain more until the start of its next turn. Its next weapon attack deals Energy bonus damage equal to the OVERSHIELD lost, and all targets hit by the attack are IMPAIRED until the end of their next turn.

name: Amplifier Drone
effect:
Amplifier Drone (Size 1/2, HP {5/10/15}, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, Tags: Drone, Overshield)

This drone can be deployed to a space within SENSORS and line of sight. While deployed, it projects a Burst 2 electrified area. Allied characters in the area that gain any OVERSHIELD increase the amount gained by +2. Hostile characters that enter the area or end their turn there receive LOCK ON and cease to be INVISIBLE or HIDDEN.

name: Phase Shift
effect: This character is INTANGIBLE on their turn. While INTANGIBLE, they can target and affect tangible characters and objects, but only deal half damage, Heat, Burn or to all targets.

name: Quantum Bond
effect:
The Ghost bonds with one tangible adjacent allied character, becoming INTANGIBLE and sharing one of the target’s spaces. The bonded target may take 2 Heat as a protocol to gain the Ghost’s PHASE SHIFT feature until the end of the turn. However, if either bonded character takes Heat or a condition, the other character takes the same amount of Heat and receives that condition for the same duration.

While bonded, the Ghost can only move with the bonded target’s voluntary movement. The bond ends if the Ghost uses this system again, no longer shares a space with the bonded target, or is STUNNED, JAMMED, overheated, or destroyed.

name: Paradox State
effect: The next time a hostile action is taken against a character bonded with the Ghost, roll 1d6: On a 4+, the target is INTANGIBLE during the action. This effect does not stack with INVISIBLE.

name: Entangling Curse
effect: When using the LOCK ON quick tech action, the Ghost may target two characters instead of one.

name: Superimpose Firmament
effect: The Ghost projects a Burst 2 area of Firmament energy. All tangible characters, objects, terrain, and sitrep objectives are INTANGIBLE while within the area (so INTANGIBLE characters can interact with sitrep objectives within and tangible ones cannot). The area lasts until the end of the Ghost’s next turn.

name: String Theory Marionette
effect: A character bonded with the Ghost may SKIRMISH or use the QUICK TECH action as a reaction, dealing half damage, Heat, or Burn to all targets.

name: Wavefunction Collapse
trigger: A hostile action is taken against a character bonded with the Ghost.
effect: The Ghost may first use PARADOX STATE.

name: Spectral Flight
effect: Characters affected by PHASE SHIFT may treat all of their movement as flying.

name: Split Timestream
trigger: A character bonded with the Ghost would take structure damage or stress.
effect: The triggering character instead regains all HP and clears all Heat, and the Ghost takes the structure damage or stress instead.

name: Cleaving Retrieval
effect: When the Hatchet retrieves a THROWN weapon not used to attack this turn, all hostile characters adjacent to the Hatchet must pass an AGILITY save or become SLOWED until the end of their next turn and take {4/5/6} Kinetic damage, half on success.

name: Flip Kick
effect: One adjacent character must pass a HULL save or be pushed 2 spaces away from the Hatchet and knocked PRONE. Regardless of the result, the target cannot take reactions until the end of this turn, and the Hatchet flies 2 spaces away from the target.

name: Whirlwind Kick
effect: Adjacent hostile characters must pass a HULL save or be pushed 2 spaces away from the Hatchet and be IMPAIRED until the end of their next turn.

name: Plasma Knife
effect: When retrieving this weapon, CLEAVING RETRIEVAL’S damage becomes AP.

name: Rocket Bola
on_hit: The target must pass a HULL save or be IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn.

name: Reckless Dive
trigger: A ranged or THROWN melee attack hits the Hatchet.
effect: The Hatchet interrupts the attack, moves up to its SPEED directly towards the attacker, and makes an attack against them. If this attack hits, the Hatchet gains RESISTANCE to all damage from the triggering attack.

name: Return to Sender
trigger: The Hatchet is targeted by a THROWN melee attack or would be affected by a GRENADE.
effect: Roll 1d6. On a 4+, the attack or grenade is negated. If an attack was negated, the Hatchet repeats the attack against the attacker. If a grenade was negated, the Hatchet may throw the same grenade, targeting a space occupied by the grenade’s original controller. These effects ignore any range restrictions upon the triggering effect.

name: Champion’s Greatsword
on_hit: The target gains LOCK ON. If they are affected by COMPELLED DUEL, they are also SHREDDED until the end of their next turn.

name: Compelled Duel
effect:
A hostile character within SENSORS and line of sight enters a duel with the Knight. While in the duel, the target must make a SYSTEMS save at the start of each of their turns. On a failure, until the start of the target’s next turn, they receive +3 Difficulty on all attacks that don’t include the Knight as a target, and they cannot voluntarily move away from the Knight.

The duel lasts until the end of the scene or until one of the opponents is destroyed. Each character cannot enter another duel until the end of this duel.

name: Templar’s Shield
effect: The Knight raises a shield, gaining RESISTANCE to all damage from its duel opponent until the end of its next turn.

name: Hero’s Banner
effect:
Hero’s Banner (Size 1/2, HP {10/20/30}, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, Tags: Deployable, Shield)

The Knight deploys a banner that projects a Burst 3 area in an adjacent space. Allied characters within the area gain RESISTANCE to all damage. If this banner is destroyed, allied characters in the area are SHREDDED until the end of their next turn.

name: Sweeping Blows
effect: When attacking with the CHAMPION’S GREATSWORD, the Knight may choose to attack in a Cone 3 area.

name: Punishing Blow
trigger: The Knight’s duel opponent uses a hostile action that does not include the Knight as a target.
effect: The Knight SKIRMISHES the triggering character, knocking them PRONE on a hit.

name: Second Wind
effect: The Knight regains half of its HP and clears one condition. The Knight can take this action even if it would be prevented from taking actions on its turn.

name: Mighty Throw
effect: The Knight throws an adjacent character, pushing them away from the Knight and ignoring terrain and obstructions. Allied characters are thrown up to 5 spaces. Hostile characters must pass a HULL save or be thrown up to 3 spaces and knocked PRONE.

name: Center Stage
effect: The Mesmerist cannot HIDE nor become HIDDEN.

name: Memetic Magnetism
effect: The Mesmerist makes a tech attack against all hostile characters within Burst {2/3/4}. On a hit, until the start of the target’s next turn, they take {2/3/4} Heat whenever they perform any hostile action that doesn’t include the Mesmerist as a target.

name: Mirror Image
effect: Roll 1d3+1. The Mesmerist creates that many mirror images occupying its space until it uses this system again. The Mesmerist is INVISIBLE for as long as it has any mirror images. Every attack that misses the Mesmerist destroys 1 mirror image.

name: Codespike Rapier
on_hit: If this attack was made as a reaction, the target becomes JAMMED until the end of their next turn.

name: Death by Glamour
effect: Whenever an attack destroys a mirror image, the attacker takes {1/2/3} Heat.

name: Mountebank’s Jaunt
effect: When the Mesmerist uses MIRROR IMAGE, it may teleport to a free space within SENSORS.

name: NARCISSUS Override
effect: One character within SENSORS may only draw line of sight to the Mesmerist and must make a SYSTEMS save. On a failure, this effect lasts until the target ends their turn adjacent to the Mesmerist. On a success, it lasts until the end of their next turn.

name: Metafold Riposte
trigger: An allied character within SENSORS is attacked.
effect: The Mesmerist first swaps places with the allied character, each character teleporting to the other’s position. The Mesmerist may then SKIRMISH against the attacker. Afterwards, the Mesmerist then becomes the target of the attack, instead.

name: Hypnotic Attraction
effect: The Mesmerist makes a tech attack against a target within SENSORS. On a success, the target moves its maximum SPEED towards the Mesmerist via the most efficient route possible. This movement is involuntary, but provokes reactions and ENGAGEMENT as normal.

name: Salamander Thermobaric Catapult
effect: This weapon attacks by drawing its line in any direction from a point within its range.

name: Adhesive Gel
effect: Characters who take any Burn from the Napalm’s abilities must pass an AGILITY save or be SLOWED until they clear all Burn.

name: Heat Haze
effect: While in the DANGER ZONE, the Napalm benefits from soft cover.

name: Smolder Charges
effect: The area targeted by the SALAMANDER THERMOBARIC CATAPULT becomes a smokescreen 4 spaces high that provides soft cover against attacks made within or through it. Attacks affected by this cover treat their target as INVISIBLE. The area lasts until the start of the Napalm’s next turn.

name: Corrosive Gel
effect: Characters affected by ADHESIVE GEL are also SHREDDED until they clear all Burn.

name: Firefly Drone
effect:
Firefly Drone (Size 1/2, HP {5/10/15}, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, Tags: Drone)

This drone can be deployed to a space within SENSORS and line of sight. While deployed, hostile characters in Burst 2 of the drone cannot draw line of sight outside of the area. If the drone takes any Burn, it explodes; all characters in Burst 2 must pass an AGILITY save or take {2/4/6} Burn.

name: Incendiary Grenade
effect: A Blast 1 area in Range 5 is set on fire and becomes difficult terrain until extinguished or until the end of the scene. Characters that start their turn within the area or move into it for the first time in a round must pass an ENGINEERING save or take {2/4/6} Burn.

name: Long-Burn Catalyst
effect: The area targeted by the SALAMANDER THERMOBARIC CATAPULT is set on fire and becomes difficult terrain until extinguished, until the end of the scene, or until this system is used again. Characters that start their turn within the area or move into it for the first time in a round must pass an ENGINEERING save or take {1/2/3} Heat and {2/3/4} Burn.

name: FLOCK Drones
effect:
FLOCK Drone (Size 1/2, HP 5, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, Tags: Drone)

This drone can be deployed to an adjacent space, and the Occultist enters the scene with 2 of these drones adjacent to it. While adjacent to a drone, allied characters gain soft cover and hostile characters take 1 Heat each time they take an action. Only 5 drones may be deployed at a time.

name: Diviner’s Darts
effect:
This weapon can attack 1-2 targets at a time.

On Attack: A DRONE controlled by the attacker and within SENSORS may move adjacent to the target.

name: Reap the Chaff
effect:
Target a controlled DRONE or allied GRUNT in SENSORS. Destroy them and apply these effects:
  • Allied characters adjacent to the target gain OVERSHIELD {4/6/8} and clear one condition.
  • Hostile characters adjacent to the target gain LOCK-ON and must pass an AGILITY save or become JAMMED until the end of their next turn.

name: Jealous Flock
effect: While within the area created by a FLOCK DRONE, allied characters gain RESISTANCE to all damage, Heat, and Burn, and hostile characters are SHREDDED.

name: Lead Astray
effect: Make a tech attack against a DRONE within SENSORS. On a hit, the Occultist controls the target DRONE until the end of its next turn.

name: Scapegoat
trigger: An ally within the Occultist’s SENSORS and Range 3 of a controlled DRONE or allied GRUNT is hit by an attack or fails a save against an effect.
effect: The controlled DRONE or allied GRUNT becomes the target of the attack or effect, instead.

name: Harvest Pyres
effect: When a controlled DRONE or allied GRUNT in SENSORS is destroyed, hostile characters within Burst 1 of the destroyed character must pass an ENGINEERING save or take {1/2/3} Heat and {2/4/6} Burn.

name: Call From Below
effect:
MOLOCH Drone (Size 3, HP {20/25/30}, Evasion 6, E-Defense 10, Tags: Drone)

As a full action, destroy a controlled DRONE or allied GRUNT in SENSORS and deploy this drone in one of that character’s spaces. Hostile characters that start their turn within Range 3 of this drone must pass a HULL save or be pulled adjacent to the drone and become grappled by it.

name: Prismatic Projector
effect:
Place an untargetable holographic projector in a free space within SENSORS. The Prism is treated as occupying a projector’s space for all purposes, including RANGE, THREAT, SENSORS, line of sight, adjacency, engagement, contesting objectives, being affected by abilities. The Prism gains RESISTANCE to all damage, Heat, and Burn inflicted through a projector.

If the Prism would have more than 1 projector, it must destroy any beyond that limit. Projectors last until the end of the scene, or until the Prism is STUNNED, JAMMED, overheated, or destroyed.

name: Diffraction Beam
on_hit: The target can only draw line of sight to the Prism until the end of their next turn.
effect: This weapon only targets hostile characters. Attacks made through a projector gain AP.

name: Refracting Armor
effect: Attacks targeting characters, objects, or spaces within Burst 3 of the Prism lose the benefit of SEEKING.

name: Double Vision
effect: The Prism may have 2 projectors at a time.

name: OMNIGLASS Barrier
effect: As a quick action, deploy two sections of hard cover (Line 3, Size 2, {10/15/20} HP), within Range 3. Tech attacks and SEEKING do not ignore this cover.

name: Shardsplitter Shotgun
effect: The Prism may OVERWATCH with this weapon when hostile characters enter or leave spaces within its THREAT, regardless where their movement began.

name: Scintillating Gleam
effect: The Prism creates a Burst 3 area of glittering light until the end of its next turn. Hostile characters cannot draw line of sight to any character, object, or space in the area besides the Prism.

name: Shattered Glass
trigger: The Prism or an allied character in Range 5 is attacked while a projector exists.
effect: The Prism first destroys a projector and teleports the triggering character to a space it occupied. Regardless of RANGE or line of sight, the Prism becomes the new target of the attack, gaining RESISTANCE as if it was targeted through a projector. After the attack, the attacker must pass an AGILITY save or be IMPAIRED until the end of their next turn and take {4/5/6} Kinetic damage, half on success.

name: Amorphous
effect: The Torrent always has soft cover, and it ignores difficult terrain and engagement. Other characters can move through and end their turns in the Torrent’s spaces, and long as it occupies at least 1 free space, it can end its turn overlapping obstructions, cover, or other characters.

name: Undertow
effect: Involuntary movement caused by the Torrent ignores difficult terrain. Hostile characters that collide with an obstruction due to this movement must pass a HULL save or be knocked PRONE.

name: Wavebreaker
effect: This weapon must always inflict KNOCKBACK. After the attack resolves, the Torrent pushes itself to one of the spaces in the attack’s area.

name: Storm Surge
effect: The Torrent moves 10 spaces in a straight line, ignoring engagement and obstructing characters. Hostile characters that the Torrent passes through at least once must make HULL save or be pushed to a space adjacent to the Torrent at the end of its movement.

name: Scalding Greywash
effect: The Torrent lashes out with scalding greywash. Hostile characters in a Cone 3 area must pass an AGILITY save or take {3/4/5} Burn and become IMPAIRED until the end of their next turn.

name: Wash Away
effect: When the Torrent inflicts involuntary movement upon PRONE hostile characters, they are pushed an additional 2 spaces in any direction.

name: Roil
effect: The Torrent erupts in a Burst 2 area of roiling nanites. Hostile characters in the area must pass a HULL save or be knocked PRONE and pushed 2 spaces away from the Torrent. The affected area becomes difficult terrain for the rest of the scene.

name: Crashing Tsunami
effect:
This weapon must always inflict KNOCKBACK. After the attack resolves, the Torrent pushes itself to one of the spaces in the attack’s area.

When the Torrent knocks a character PRONE, it may reload this weapon.

name: Drown in Nanites
effect: One adjacent character must pass an ENGINEERING save or be JAMMED and SLOWED until they break adjacency. On a success, they are instead SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: “Magpie” Subroutines
effect:
Destroy one of the following:
  • An adjacent wreckage.
  • A weapon or system equipped by the Vulture.
  • A weapon or system equipped by a willing adjacent character.
The Vulture or a character in Range 5 then gains one of the following benefits:
  • RECHARGE one weapon or system.
  • Repair one destroyed weapon or system.
  • All LIMITED weapons and systems regain 1 use.
  • Gain OVERSHIELD {4/6/8} and clear 1 condition.

name: “Condor” Jet Propulsion Wings
effect: The Vulture can fly whenever it moves or BOOSTS. It must land at the end of its turn or begin falling.

name: “Dandelion” Flak Cannon
effect: On Attack: The area affected by this weapon provides soft cover until the end of the Vulture’s next turn. Characters at least partly within this cover cannot draw line of sight outside of its area.

name: Trash to Treasure
effect:
“MAGPIE” SUBROUTINES gains an additional option when it destroys a wreckage:
  • Gain a weapon or system owned by the wreckage’s original character. It gains LIMITED 1, replacing any other value of LIMITED.

name: Jumpstart
effect: The target of “MAGPIE” SUBROUTINES may immediately recharge {1/2/3} weapons or systems.

name: Opportunistic Salvage
trigger: A DRONE or DEPLOYABLE is destroyed within Range 5.
effect: Immediately use “MAGPIE” SUBROUTINES, without needing to destroy a wreckage, weapon, or system.

name: Magnet Bomb
effect: Characters in a Blast 1 area in Range 5 gain LOCK ON and must make an AGILITY save. On a failure, all weapon attacks made against them gain SEEKING until the end of their next turn, and they take {4/6/8} Explosive damage, half on success.

name: “Carcass” Bunker
effect:
“Carcass” Bunker (Size 4, HP {15/20/25}, Evasion 5, E-Defense 5, Tags: Deployable)

Destroy an adjacent wreckage and deploy a bunker in Burst 2 area centered upon it. All characters completely within the affected area gain hard cover against all attacks made from outside the bunker.

name: Zeal
effect:
The Zealot emanates a Burst 3 area of fervent energy. While within the area, characters gain the following:
  • Allied characters gain IMMUNITY to hostile involuntary movement, and their attacks gain AP against targets within the Zealot’s SENSORS.
  • Hostile characters that have any Burn lose INVISIBLE and HIDDEN and can’t regain either status until they leave the area.
This area lasts until the start of the Zealot’s first turn each round or until the Zealot is STUNNED, JAMMED, overheated, or destroyed.

name: Emberlight Nexus
effect: This weapon ignores INVISIBLE and doesn’t affect allied characters.

name: Fanatical Charge
effect: The Zealot flies up to its SPEED and gains OVERSHIELD {4/6/8}. Allied characters affected by ZEAL at any point during this movement may BOOST up to their SPEED +2 as a reaction. At the end of the Zealot’s movement, all allied characters affected by ZEAL gain OVERSHIELD {2/3/4}.

name: Blazing Fervor
effect: Allied characters affected by ZEAL deal an additional 1 Burn on successful attacks.

name: Flagellant’s Cleansing
effect: The Zealot clears up to one condition on each allied character affected by ZEAL. The Zealot gains each condition cleared until the end of its next turn.

name: Rally the Righteous
effect: The Zealot may pull any number of allied characters within SENSORS up to 5 spaces directly towards it. The Zealot and all allied characters affected by ZEAL may then gain OVERSHIELD {2/3/4}.

name: Brand the Heretic
effect: The Zealot makes a tech attack against a character within SENSORS. On a hit, the target gains LOCK ON. When an allied character consumes this LOCK ON, they gain OVERSHIELD {4/5/6}, and any damage they deal to the target for the rest of the turn cannot be reduced in any way.

name: Martyrdom
effect: When the Zealot would take structure damage or be destroyed, it first grants OVERSHIELD {2/3/4} to each allied character affected by ZEAL and inflicts {2/3/4} Burn on each hostile character affected by ZEAL.

name: Dirty Fighting
effect: On a critical hit, the Brigand’s target must pass a HULL save or be knocked PRONE.

name: Jury-Rigged
effect: The Brigand receives +1 Difficulty on HULL checks and saves.

name: Brigand Systems and Traits
effect: When choosing optional systems, the Brigand can also choose from the Brigand Systems and Traits and Pirate Systems and Traits (Lancer, p. 328).

name: Finishing Blow
effect: The Brigand deals +3 bonus damage against PRONE targets.

name: JAIL//BREAK
effect: The Brigand targets one hostile mech with the AI tag within SENSORS. That mech must succeed on a SYSTEMS save or have all their installed AIs enter cascade. AIs immune to cascade are unaffected.

name: Commandeer
effect:
The Brigand targets one hostile DEPLOYABLE or DRONE. Until the end of the scene, the Brigand is treated as the controller of the target DEPLOYABLE or DRONE. DRONES cannot be recalled while affected by this system.

The original controller can regain control and end this effect with a successful SYSTEMS check as a quick action while the affected DEPLOYABLE or DRONE is within their SENSORS and line of sight.

name: Tempered Reactor
effect:
This template may only be taken by an NPC with more than 1 STRESS.

This NPC receives +2 HEAT CAP.
